title: ATLAS - FUTURE TREATMENTS (back to Production daily process)

task_list.instruction_title:
Retour à la normal du process des deals futur ROUTING12
Retour à la validation SX37 pour les deals ROUTING12




Poste à supprimer

_

Pour les décomptes validés passer le FLAG : \"AVIS\" à **NO sur les tables T_SE_TS et T_COM_DET.**




update  nhdbo.t_se_Ts t
set t.flag_advc_crea_0640 = 'N'
where (t.nbr_co_bo_0640, t.nbr_oper_ts_sx_0640) in 
(select o.nbr_co_bo_0640_0641, o.nbr_oper_ts_sx_0640_0641 from nhdbo.t_migr_fut f, nhdbo.t_Se_Deal d, nhdbo.t_se_ord o
where d.nbr_co_bo_0770   = f.nbr_co_bo_1142
and   d.nbr_deal_sx_0770 = f.nbr_deal_sx_1142
and   o.nbr_co_bo_0770_0641   = d.nbr_co_bo_0770
and   o.nbr_deal_sx_0770_0641 = d.nbr_deal_sx_0770)
;

update nhdbo.t_com_det cd
set cd.flag_advc_crea_0158 = 'N'
where (cd.nbr_oper_ts_sx_0158) in 
(select o.nbr_oper_ts_sx_0640_0641 from nhdbo.t_migr_fut f, nhdbo.t_Se_Deal d, nhdbo.t_se_ord o
where d.nbr_co_bo_0770   = f.nbr_co_bo_1142
and   d.nbr_deal_sx_0770 = f.nbr_deal_sx_1142
and   o.nbr_co_bo_0770_0641   = d.nbr_co_bo_0770
and   o.nbr_deal_sx_0770_0641 = d.nbr_deal_sx_0770)
;

Executer la requête :  SQL update flag advice SX Futures.sql disponible sur le SharePoint, dossier **Contrats futurs**

For RUN2, this was the path:

[https://spconfidential/projects/victoria-it/02%20%20Migration%20Stream/02%20-%20Positions%20and%20Contracts/02.03-RUN%202/02.03.06%20Contrats%20Futures/02.06.10_SQL%20update%20flag%20advice%20SX%20Futures.sql](https://spconfidential/projects/victoria-it/02%20%20Migration%20Stream/02%20-%20Positions%20and%20Contracts/02.03-RUN%202/02.03.06%20Contrats%20Futures/02.06.10_SQL%20update%20flag%20advice%20SX%20Futures.sql)

Modifier seuil tolerance prix de migration – prix ATLAS pour le flux du process FUTURE (englobant aussi ACCU-DECU + IRS) – Retour à la situation normale
